comment: I thought Gab was a platform for absolute free speech. Now that I see it isn't, this account will become inactive until current policies change. The banning of "loli" drawings and plans to allow comment censorship through a quasi-block feature expose Gab's free speech commitment as a sham. I will not participate in yet another censorship platform.
amr:
# ::snt I thought Gab was a platform for absolute free speech. Now that I see it isn't, this account will become inactive until current policies change. The banning of "loli" drawings and plans to allow comment censorship through a quasi-block feature expose Gab's free speech commitment as a sham. I will not participate in yet another censorship platform.

      :snt1 (t / think-01

            :ARG1 (p / platform

                        :name (n / name

                  :ARG0 a2)
            :time (n2 / now)

                              :time (c2 / current)))))
      :snt3 (e / expose-01

                  :op2 (p4 / plan-01

                              :ARG1 (c3 / censor-01
                                    :ARG1 (c4 / comment-01))
                              :manner (f2 / feature
                                    :mod (b3 / block
                                          :mod (q / quasi))))))
            :ARG1 (c5 / commit-01
                  :ARG1 (p5 / person
                        :name n
                        :op1 "Gab"))
            :ARG2 (s2 / speak-01
                  :ARG3-of (f3 / free-04)))
      :ARG2 (s3 / sham)
      :snt4 (p6 / participate-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (p7 / platform
                  :mod (a6 / another)
